node.title: Obsydia Crossing VRChat World Open to Public Until August 8
node.description: Nijisanji EN's Obsydia unit celebrates its first-year debut anniversary by launching the Obsydia Crossing on VRChat. Selen Tatsuki leads this project together with Kanauru. Obsydia Crossing is modeled after Japan's famous Shibuya Crossing.
